DOC.brief_summary: multi-center , prospective , randomize , open-labeled , active-drug-controlled , two-parallel-group-comparison ( venoferrun group vs Bolgre group ) study
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Safety Study Iron Sucrose Oral Iron Acetyl-transferrin Hydroglycerin
DOC.criteria: 30~32nd week pregnant woman age 18 year Women Hb level 10.0g/dL week study initiation Patients agree participate study write Patients participate another clinical study recent 3 month Patients prone acute hemorrhage pregnancy Patients show intolerance iron therapy Hemolytic anemia , hemoglobinopathy ( thalassemia , sickle cell ) Bleeding tendency , hypersplenism Chronic heart failure , Class IIIV heart disease , uncontrolled arterial hypertension ( DBP â‰¥ 115mmHg ) , deep vein thrombosis , thrombocytosis , chronic renal disease Severe renal failure patient ( 2.5 time higher plasma creatinine level high limit normal state ) Patients severe liver dysfunction ( 2.5 time higher AST ALT high limit normal state ) Patients double CK level high limit normal state Patients regard ineligible study investigator
